sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About

Hi. I'm Husam, nice to meet you. Please take a look around.

I'm focused on specializing in full-stack development, covering both front-end and backend aspects of application creation. I'm proficient in web languages like HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Java, and C and I also have experience with APIs and databases. My goal is to become a well-rounded developer who can create complete and seamless applications, constantly growing and learning in the field of software engineering.

) } export default About
